title: Gorgeous medford 4 bed 2 bath!1
posting_body: ***Work is being completed this week and will be professionally cleaned***
VERY LARGE, Beautifully RENOVATED, OPEN LIVING SPACE, 2nd and 3rd floor of a meticulously maintained 2 ...2 family house on quiet tree lined street...

4 Good sized bedrooms, Eat in kitchen ( with all new STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES) LARGE, OPEN LIVING ROOM & DINING ROOM w/ Decorative Fireplace, 2nd small Living room ( or large study) between the 2 3rd floor bedrooms...
There is a 5th BR (which is a renovated porch that is 7 feet wide by 26 feet long)

3 minute drive to entrance to RT 93 ( into BOSTON or heading north), very close to Somerville/ Ball ( 10 minutes walk) sq & Davis Square ( 20 minutes walk), ***ENORMOUS FENCED YARD***, there is a driveway with 3 or 4 tandem parking spaces avail for rent or street parking is easy
